javadoc: Creates a component for editing Integer values using an integerTextField and a Jspinner.

methods.javadoc:
Creates a new IntegerSpinner using the given spinner model.
@param spinnerModel the spinner model to use in the JSpinner.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a new IntegerSpinner using the given spinner model.

params.name: spinnerModel
params.comment: the spinner model to use in the JSpinner.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the IntegerTextField that has been attached to the spinner.
@return the IntegerTextField that has been attached to the spinner.
methods.name: getTextField
methods.comment: Returns the IntegerTextField that has been attached to the spinner.

return.comment: the IntegerTextField that has been attached to the spinner.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the given value to both the spinner and the text field.
@param value the value to set.
methods.name: setValue
methods.comment: Sets the given value to both the spinner and the text field.

methods.name: addChangeListener
methods.comment:
Adds a ChangeListener to the model's listener list.  The
 ChangeListeners must be notified when the models value changes.

methods.javadoc:
Removes a ChangeListener from the model's listener list.
@param listener the ChangeListener to remove
methods.name: removeChangeListener
methods.comment: Removes a ChangeListener from the model's listener list.

name: IntegerSpinner
